title: april 11: U.S. navy acquires first submarine
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the day the United States acquired its very first submarine, which made traveling beneath the surface of the ocean possible. Turning to music, she talks about the day Canadian singer-songwriter Mac DeMarco released his single "On the Level," a groovy slow jam that was featured on his third studio album, This Old Dog. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
